website_summaries.verdict: Large-capacity coffee maker that maintains the proper water temperature for the best coffee quality.
pros: Uses a copper lining in the spray arm that helps the coffee maker maintain the proper temperature throughout the brewing process
Large coffee maker that can fill the carafe in 8 min
Stainless steel carafe with an impressive 60 oz
cons: No markings on unit to measure the amount of water you've added

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the overflow issues
customer_reviews.text: We have had this coffee maker since March 1, 2019 when our old BonaVita coffee maker died. The coffee maker started to overflow and stop dripping into the carafe, and eventually overflowed onto the counter and the floor. I thought my husband did something wrong and then it started happening to me. It is the 26th of April. We have used the same type/grind of coffee for years. After reading some of the comments about the coffee maker, it is very sensitive to the grind of coffee used. I also bought a separate coffee carafe because it didn't keep the coffee hot enough. I feel we wasted $300+ on this coffee brewer.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia H. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: BEST CUP EVER
customer_reviews.text: I love this brewer. It brews (checking with a NSF digital thermometer) 198-205 Degrees F. When brewing into the supplied double wall 60oz. carafe, (room temperature) the temperature will drop to around 180 Degrees F. and hold that temp for about two hours before gradually falling. If you pre-heat the carafe and swap the brew lid for the travel plug (also a pourable plug) the temp will settle to 190 Degrees and hold for 5-6 hours minimum then slowly begin to fall. The brewer does feel cheap, however, because of the lightweight plastics and thin metal parts but what doesn't these days? I also had to reduce the recommended coffee amount by 40%to suit my taste.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Brewer!
customer_reviews.text: Great Coffee Brewer! Purchased this after our OXO Barista Brain 12 Cup Coffee Maker stopped working (has been discontinued too). My only complaint, is that for large families with coffee drinkers like mine, there are occasions where not all of us are present in the morning, and it would be beneficial to have the water reservoir markings on this machine (when making less than a full pot). Since a smaller brewer does not suffice for larger families, etc., from a user standpoint, it doesn't make sense to me that this feature (water reservoir markings) were not included in the design. Recommend that Technivorm revisit this decision. Thank you. John Burgoyne
customer_reviews.author: Andrea B

customer_reviews.title: Fragile, unsupported by manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Bought 8 months ago. Cleaned as per directions. Just now the silicon gasket connecting the brew head and the water reservoir pipe split in half. I called product support ready to either have it replaced under warranty or just buy a part, and was told replacement entailed shipping the unit and a $99 charge. Because it is considered to be customer damage (which I don't see) the warranty is said to not be applicable. I honestly don't need the aggravation or disrespect. Even if I get it fixed, I'll sell it and move on. I won't deal with a company that treats customers like this.
customer_reviews.author: Moosecat

customer_reviews.title: I roast coffee for a living.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these in my coffee roastery. I have found that when brewing multiple pots in a row, sometimes something happens with either a few coffee grounds can clog the hole in the coffee basket or the filter can fold over, causing a dam spilling wet coffee over the top of the basket and then everywhere. The temperature is consistent. I have the 10 cup in my home as well, and that one is not as temperamental as this 64oz. I use this brand for consistency and quality. I do find the price to be a little high.
customer_reviews.author: Ski-ball

customer_reviews.title: Finally, delicious drip coffee
customer_reviews.text: We have been loving our coffee maker. Nice to have the convenience of drip coffee with really great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Scout Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Burned myself with this machine
customer_reviews.text: I can’t count how many times this coffee maker has backed up on us. It’s so frustrating. The thing makes a mess all around it with grounds and water all across the countertop. I have burned myself this time trying to cleanup the coffee and opening the stupid valve. Why do I even have to open a valve? For a couple hundred dollars, a coffee maker should not be backing up at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian West

customer_reviews.title: No sir
customer_reviews.text: Holy expensiveness and did not get consistent results. Attempted to make coffee 10 times and did not get 1 good cup. This apparatus is also HUGE. Ended up with the oxo barista brain and much happier.
customer_reviews.author: HLLP

customer_reviews.title: Love this one
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these that I have purchased in the last 6 month. Best coffee maker I have ever had. It makes a larger amount very fast and the coffee is hot and says hot for a long time. We have a large family and this is the best purchase in years. I am already getting requests for this mashine as gifts for B- days and Christmas. Not cheap but very much worse the cost. Well made- great looking and makes lots of fantastic coffee fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jutta Payne

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: This was DOA out of the box. Technivorm wants me to ship it to them so they can repair it. No. I have asked the seller for my money back. I will not accept a repair to a brand new, almost $400 item. I'll find something that actually works out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Waldman

customer_reviews.title: Good but far from perfect
customer_reviews.text: For a handmade product the precision is not great. For the brewing process to work, I have to place a pamphlet under plastic pad on which coffee urn sits. The coffee does have better taste than my Oxo or Braun brewers. It would me nice if there were cup markers on water container, and one must pay careful attention to the fact that all references to a “cup” means 4 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: eroom45

customer_reviews.title: Technivorm Moccamaster CDT Grand by Technivorm from Amazon.com Services
customer_reviews.text: Technivorm Moccamaster CDT Grand by Technivorm from Amazon.com Services. If you want this machine and are not filthy rich, get this “Used - Very Good with cosmetic imperfections” from Amazon Warehouse for a decent discount. Everything about it is as described. 1 switch 60oz auto coffee brewer. No timer because Technivorm does not believe coffee should sit out ahead of brew time :(
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Loving every drop
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best coffee machine ever. It's expensive, but well worth the money. I would recommend running water through it at least 2 to 3 to get the "machine" taste out of the coffee flavor. The temperature of the coffee is always nice and hot, and the thermal carafe keeps the coffee hot for a long time. It's super easy to use, and extremely easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Luistech

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Cup of Coffee with Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Moccamaster because I wanted a hot cup of coffee that tasted great from a coffee machine that could last more than 6 years. 1 month out and I love everything about it. Easy to set up and clean, recycled basket filters work fine, there’s less low quality plastic and no annoying beeps. We owned 2 Cuisinart thermal carafe coffee makers and when the 2nd one broke due to same bad design feature (overflow hot water fried the poorly placed circuit board) I looked for a brewer that would deliver a high quality cup that is hot!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Makes great-tasting coffee and I'm a coffee snob!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best home brew ever! It's quiet, quick and a full pot of coffee stays hot in the carafe for several hours! I use less coffee grounds for my brew than the manual suggests, A LOT less, but that's just personal preference. I love that the carafe can be used for travel as well. It's been great for large groups or just my morning 2 mugs of coffee. And I LOVE that it's quality- made in Europe!
customer_reviews.author: David Nyhuis

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee maker in the world
customer_reviews.text: Not the most economical brewer. On the high side price wise. But man, if you love coffee this is the pot for you. This makes amazing coffee. Wish they would redesign the manual shut off on the basket. Overflowed it a couple of times. If you sit the basket down on a hard surface, the little rubber plunger can move into the opening and turn the flow down off. I am always checking and bending the metal spring plate away from the bottom so I am sure it will flow. But I wouldn't trade this thing. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: roque

customer_reviews.title: Moccamaster is best
customer_reviews.text: Brews great coffee. Does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: MaryKay Sogge

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee pot, makes a really good cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Must be awake when setting it up. I have had a half-dozen spill overs because I forgot to check one thing or the other, compared to my old Cuisinart pots. On the other hand? Much better coffee. Just needs a pre-flight checklist.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: used a bonvita, also good, this is better but costly
customer_reviews.text: was surprised by the better flavor and the increased capacity was great. the pot keeps the coffee warmer and longer worth the 3 times cost for us
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee-fast!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Moccamaster. Great coffee as usual, but this one does not turn off automatically. My other one does. It seems odd as this one needs no heat after the brewing is complete. However having the extra large carafe more than makes up for this flaw. Fast, great coffee is essential with my summer crowd!!!
customer_reviews.author: MHPINNY

customer_reviews.title: Wrong measurements
customer_reviews.text: The measurements for this product are wrong. Don’t know how it works because was too big and we had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kris bez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coffee
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee EVER! You won’t be disappointed. We’ve had ours for over 2 years and it was the best purchase we’ve made. We got tired of all the standard brands that basically last a year at $100 and up (which also don’t brew great coffee), so we invested in this. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: christy johnston

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: This really did improve the taste of our coffee. We are not connoisseurs like many reviewers but we very much appreciated the improvement in taste. We also got many more comments from friends and family on our coffee.
customer_reviews.author: leanne sinclair

customer_reviews.title: BEST coffee ever
customer_reviews.text: BEST coffee ever! Expensive... but worth every dollar. Full pot in 6 minutes. In use 6 months... still works like the first day.
customer_reviews.author: PKNG

customer_reviews.title: Over rated
customer_reviews.text: No better then a Mr Coffee, over stated teast doesn't keep coffee hot more then maybe 1/2 hour. Returned. For the money could have bought 2 or 3 other ones and would have been as good if not better.Don't belive what you read.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee maker. So simple to operate. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SRP

customer_reviews.title: Love these excellent and hardy brewers
customer_reviews.text: This is my third and largest capacity Technivorm coffee brewer. Love these excellent and hardy brewers!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Arn

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much I got my daughter one for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffeemaker. Wish it had a pour spout tho.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi N

customer_reviews.title: Coffee lover
customer_reviews.text: It is expensive but it’s worth every penny because when you wake up in the morning you just love your coffee that much more
customer_reviews.author: nina rivelli

customer_reviews.title: Taste of coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is our second. We had the first one for years and knew we would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Garey Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brews! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffeemaker on the planet! For the home of course.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ruhm

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best money i have ever spent on a coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: ginger is me

customer_reviews.title: Coffee was awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The coffee was delicious but the carafe didn’t keep the coffee hot.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Field

customer_reviews.title: This machine makes the best cup of coffee I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes the best cup of coffee I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Gifted Gift

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Poor design. Leaks coffee a lot for no clear reason in spite of proper setup. Takes a nonstandard filter size that is hard to find. A hassle to clean. Not a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel G

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The STAINLESS STEEL pot started to rust after 3 month use.
customer_reviews.author: G. Emmert

customer_reviews.title: Coffee maker does not have cup / oz / ltr ...
customer_reviews.text: Coffee maker does not have cup / oz / ltr indicator on the water tank in case you want to make less of the full capacity of the coffee Also missing a drip stop possibility in case if you want to pull the coffee can early Power Cable very thick and clumsy
customer_reviews.author: A-CB

customer_reviews.title: Like the fifteen cup size and thermal carafe the most
customer_reviews.text: Higher expectations for cost... works as stated. Could use auto shut off and a pour indention on carafe. Hard to find commercial size large basket filters. Like the fifteen cup size and thermal carafe the most.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick C.

customer_reviews.title: Better coffee
customer_reviews.text: Makes good coffee, but a little quirky and took getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ricker-Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee maker, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Best drip coffee maker I've ever used. Isn't as fast as my old Bunn, but the coffee tastes much better.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: This was not said to be used. It came used covered in coffee grounds, wrong model, no carafe it's a 10 cup model! Will be returning it totally misrepresented, scam!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed with this coffee maker because the plastic water container ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this coffee maker because the plastic water container for making the coffee does not have any measuring number of ounces scale printed. It is very difficult to have to be measuring cup by cup when adding the amount of water for the number of cups that need to be brewed.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Vela, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: constantly overflows making a mess
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Looks great and on the occasions that it works properly makes decent coffee but the water pours way too fast often causing the grounds to flow over the paper filter from Moccamaster, clog the filter system and pour grounds and coffee all over the place! Bought this for a stylish boutique office set up and after 3 weeks no one will touch it for fear of "the explosion" ridiculous overpriced waste. We've tried following directions in terms of the amount of coffee etc. but no solution works consistently. This machine really sucks!
customer_reviews.author: KP- longtime Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This makes a great cup of coffee and is very easy to clean. I like the quick performance of the unit and it’s also attractive. My main issue is with the “pause and pour” function. Several times I have accidentally jiggled the tab which blocks the output which means you get a total mess. Since this machine heats the water to the correct 196 degrees it’s literally a hot mess. I also wish that you didn’t have to buy their filters but c’est la vie. Great coffee is the bottom line and this delivers on that plus the turnaround from wishing to having coffee is quick. Just be very careful about that little metal tab.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B. Barthel

customer_reviews.title: Fast, makes very good tasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: Work fast and makes average coffee taste better. If you put in just run of the mill beans, they taste much better out of this machine. It also brews about 2x as fast as my old Mr Coffee. I'm VERY pleased with it. It feels very well made, worth the money. The frickin' power cord looks like a 220v cable, the whole thing is over built. My ONLY complaint is the lack of marks on the water tank so we had to experiment a little early on and then use a tiny amount of tape to mark our own.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee I have had but room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: The Coffee is awesome so 10 out of 10. The quality of the machine and flexibility could use some help. The ground holder is poorly designed in that it does not stop coffee from dripping after the brew. It uses a piece of metal to pinch against the drain to stop the coffee. You have to used the carafe every time, which is less ideal when making one cup. Is the plastic BPH free it seem very cheap versus other coffee machines? Again, best coffee but could use some improvement with materials and mixing chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Not a good unit at any price.
customer_reviews.text: For what this unit costs it should have an automatic flow stop under the basket. If you forget to close it you drip boiling water all over the place and if you forget to open it your entire pot of coffee ends up on the counter. Very lame design and the quality of the entire unit is marginal for the money. Me Coffee is made better then this unit. I’m serious.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Maker at a great warehouse price!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted the larger size Technivorm for years. We have the smaller sized one with the insulated carafe and have used it for years. But we are always making 2 pots of coffee in the mornings. Amazon had the big one in their warehouse deal (probably a return) and I jumped on it. It arrived in the original packaging with all the components. The packaging was obviously previously opened, but no problem. Great deal and what a coffee maker. Best ever. Now I have two Technivorm machines.... I think I will keep the original one for road trips.......
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this pricey coffee maker for 3 months. The carafe leaks at the handle and coffee does not stay warm long. Also, the filter basket failes to hold the filter in place, so many times it backs up and not into the carafe. For the $$$ we paid, these issues should not happen!! We're going back to the tried and true Mr. COFFEE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Eh....
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. My husband and I can't tell the difference between this coffee brewer and our old $70 brewer. We even bought high end coffee to see if that made a difference, it didn't. I would've returned it but my husband likes the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: makes an awesome cup of coffee the only gripe is they should ...
customer_reviews.text: makes an awesome cup of coffee the only gripe is they should have put some sort of non-skid tabs on bottom of caraffe as it tends to slide away from the button to keep the brewer operating, you have to really push it up against it to keep it engaged, I will glue three or four strips of rubber to mine so it doesn't do this, well after a year and a half the bottom of the carafe fell off and guess what is not covered by the 5 year warrenty
customer_reviews.author: Marshall LaCasse

customer_reviews.title: DIY know how helps, great coffee brewer
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great tasting cup of coffee, easy to clean and disassemble, carafe keeps coffee warm all day. Cons: the tab to allow coffee to flow into carafe could be labeled to allow user to know it is opened or closed; counter intuitive nature led to coffee overflow with multiple users, the plastic base had to be modified to allow the coffee maker to even function correctly; I hope this was a one off flaw but I had to alter the design with an sharp knife to use which is why I rate ease of use so low.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Romero

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee for Us, Ever
customer_reviews.text: just perfect. we have been through many high end coffee pots, with whistles we don't need or don't work. this coffee pot is easy to use, clean, everything.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlight Glitter Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice coffee maker, I’ve had it for six months. Shut off valve is cheesy and drips
customer_reviews.author: Slacker554

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee maker! Seriously easy and delicious hot coffee, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Overflow
customer_reviews.text: No Matter what I do Or Try it Overflows all most everything I try
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, it is tall so check your height available if under a counter.
customer_reviews.author: JR7

customer_reviews.title: At the head of the really large home size
customer_reviews.text: Super brewer for large pots of coffee. Really nice if you need the capacity. I took a star off because the thermos is not up to the standard of some, eg the zojirushi, but it is not terrible either.
customer_reviews.author: puff bird

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee we’ve ever brewed at home.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent coffee maker. Best coffee we’ve ever brewed at home, far superior to any coffee maker we’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coffee maker. We have owned Technivorm coffee makers for years. This model had an issue which Amazon and Technivorm corrected immediately! Great customer service! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: The best coffee ever
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed. You cannot beat the the Moccamaster. The best coffee ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine and it makes great coffee and brews fast. To me , it was worth the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Clapper

customer_reviews.title: Most likely not quite worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It states it is a 15 cup coffee maker, but it is only 60oz. not much more than the other 10 cut units I had before I got this one. the carafe does not have a pouring spout. it could use one. Tends to get coffee grounds in the coffee output, because it try's to make coffee very fast. OK if you want coffee fast, but that is the price of fast. Nice unit, but a bit over priced. But it is fast
customer_reviews.author: C. Stanley Kintner

customer_reviews.title: I've had the CDT Grand for about a month now and my hubby and I are very happy with the product - as with our other Moccamaster
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Moccamaster (Clement Design) user for several years. When it broke down I was thrilled to learn Technivorm had a model with a capacity to make sure than 10-12 cups of coffee! I've had the CDT Grand for about a month now and my hubby and I are very happy with the product - as with our other Moccamaster, the coffee produced is the best tasting we've had. I did have issues with it at first not turning on (I would have to turn the switch off and then on again), but that kink seems to have worked itself out. And, the delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: BubbaDog

customer_reviews.title: The very best coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: The very best coffee maker. So easy to clean and 12 cup capacity is very useful. Clearly expensive, but a special gift to tourself is in order!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon - NYC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coffee pot, makes coffee taste like it came from Starbucks. Ordered another one for family for Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: tomogg

customer_reviews.title: is not great.
customer_reviews.text: uses a ton of coffee, the plastic where the carafe sits on, is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Mcp

customer_reviews.title: Made three pots of coffee with it and it tastes terrible!! This is definitely not worth the $$ ...
customer_reviews.text: First order arrived broken. Second order arrived missing parts and the owners manual (had to download from their site). Made three pots of coffee with it and it tastes terrible!! This is definitely not worth the $$ being charged. Cheap, flimsy plastic crap!
customer_reviews.author: Paula MacArthur

product_meta.title: Technivorm 39340 CDT Grand 60, oz Brushed, Silver
product_meta.description: The Moccamaster CDT Grand coffeemaker is perfect for those who entertain, small offices and Coffee shops. This brewer brews a full 60oz pot of Coffee in six minutes and includes a thermal carafe that will keep your Coffee hot up to an hour and brews A full 60 oz. pot of Coffee in six minutes. To keep Coffee hot longer or for traveling with your carafe, switch to the included travel lid. The CDT Grand has a commercial style, flat bottom brew-basket and it is recommended to only brew a full pot of Coffee with this model. All Moccamaster Coffee Brewers are handmade in the Netherlands and backed by an industry leading 5-year.
feature_bullets: Perfectly brewed coffee delivered by our copper element and no pumps
Coffee maker features a stainless steel thermal carafe to keep Coffee hot longer
Backed by a 5-year Manufacturers. Voltage is 120 V

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
